Title: Alt text overhaul
Description: Replace generic/missing alt with meaningful descriptions; decorative images alt="".
Acceptance_Criteria: All images have appropriate alt; no redundant terms like 'image'.

Title: Headings & landmarks
Description: One <h1> per page; logical h2–h3; add <main>; remove duplicate navs.
Acceptance_Criteria: Semantic outline logical; minimal, labelled landmarks.

Title: Forms: labels, errors, consent
Description: Correct label-for associations; ARIA for groups; aria-live error summary; GDPR consent copy.
Acceptance_Criteria: Keyboard/SR usable; inline + summary errors clear.

Title: Donate CTA system
Description: Define Primary/Secondary button system; sticky Donate on mobile.
Acceptance_Criteria: Consistent CTA hierarchy; contrast compliant.

Title: Canonical domain & redirects
Description: Enforce single canonical (www or bare), 301 alternate; 301 /Contribute.html → Support; update XML sitemap; add rel=canonical; submit to GSC.
Acceptance_Criteria: All variants resolve to canonical; sitemap validates; crawl shows no 4xx; canonical present.
Validation_Steps: HTTP trace; Screaming Frog (100 URLs); GSC index coverage check.

Title: Global navigation consistency
Description: Standardise labels (Donate, Contact), ensure single <nav> landmark.
Acceptance_Criteria: One nav landmark; consistent labels across pages and breadcrumbs.
Validation_Steps: Axe landmarks audit; manual keyboard traversal.

Title: Focus states & keyboard operability
Description: Visible :focus on links/buttons/menus; no focus traps; sticky header doesn’t hide focus.
Acceptance_Criteria: Clear focus indicator; logical tab order; no obscured focus.
Validation_Steps: Keyboard-only sweep; WCAG 2.2 Focus Appearance pass.

Title: Copy proofing (UK locale)
Description: Fix typos/truncations; standardise UK spellings; £ currency.
Acceptance_Criteria: Zero spelling/grammar issues; UK terminology throughout.

Title: Privacy & cookies
Description: Publish concise Privacy and Cookie policy pages; link in footer and forms.
Acceptance_Criteria: Pages live and linked; consent text on forms.

Title: Hero content pass
Description: Tighten subheadline to one line; primary Donate; secondary link to recent displays.
Acceptance_Criteria: Clear hierarchy; mobile wraps cleanly.

Title: Single nav landmark
Description: Remove duplicate nav blocks; ensure <nav aria-label='Primary'> only.
Acceptance_Criteria: Single nav landmark on Home.

Title: Localise payments form
Description: Zip→Postcode; default Country → United Kingdom; GBP locked.
Acceptance_Criteria: UK locale end-to-end.

Title: Errors & consent
Description: Accessible error handling and aria-live summary; consent text and links added.
Acceptance_Criteria: Clear inline errors; summary announced; consent present.

Title: Footer legal & identity
Description: Replace Nicepage credit with org identity, mission strapline, ©, Privacy, Cookies links.
Acceptance_Criteria: Footer present on all pages; accessible; links work.

Title: Video accessibility or removal
Description: Remove placeholder error or provide playable video with captions + transcript.
Acceptance_Criteria: No error message remains; accessible media if present.

Title: Standardise title
Description: Use 'Contact' site‑wide instead of variants.
Acceptance_Criteria: Consistent page titles and nav labels.

Title: Gallery copy fixes
Description: Correct 'copyrights' spelling and any gallery text typos.
Acceptance_Criteria: No copy errors remain in Gallery.

Title: Responsive grid + lightbox (a11y)
Description: Keyboard-navigable modal with captions and photographer credit.
Acceptance_Criteria: Operable via keyboard and SR.
Validation_Steps: Keyboard/SR journey; modal focus trap check.

Title: Gallery image pipeline
Description: Apply P‑01 (AVIF/WebP/srcset/lazy) to all gallery assets; descriptive alt or decorative ''.
Acceptance_Criteria: Gallery image bytes ↓ ≥50%.
Validation_Steps: Lighthouse diff; network panel bytes comparison.

Title: Image optimisation pipeline
Description: Export hero ≤200KB; AVIF/WebP+JPEG; srcset/sizes; lazy below fold; decoding=async.
Acceptance_Criteria: LCP ≤2.5s on 4G; gallery image bytes ↓ ≥50%.

Title: CSS/JS diet
Description: Inline critical CSS (≤14KB); defer non-critical JS; remove unused Nicepage bundles; tree-shake.
Acceptance_Criteria: FCP improves; JS bytes reduced; no regressions.

Title: Target size & drag alternatives
Description: Interactive targets ≥44×44 CSS px; gallery usable without drag.
Acceptance_Criteria: All tap targets meet min size; click alternatives exist.
Validation_Steps: Mobile tap grid overlay; manual checks.

Title: Media accessibility
Description: Provide controls, captions, transcript for videos; remove placeholder error msgs.
Acceptance_Criteria: All videos accessible or removed.

Title: Share‑ready social cards
Description: Per‑page Open Graph/Twitter cards with campaign images; concise titles/descriptions.
Acceptance_Criteria: Correct previews across platforms.

Title: HTTP hints & third‑party hygiene
Description: Preload hero & primary font; minimal preconnects; defer third‑party scripts (Stripe/GoFundMe only where needed).
Acceptance_Criteria: Reduced blocking time; minimal third‑party impact.

Title: Structured data
Description: Add Organization globally; DonateAction on Support/Gentry; include social profiles.
Acceptance_Criteria: Rich Results test passes; no errors.

Title: Content hygiene (titles/meta)
Description: Unique <title> and meta descriptions; H1 matches intent; recommended lengths.
Acceptance_Criteria: No duplicates; lengths OK; intent aligned.

Title: Fix truncations & timeline
Description: Correct 'Proud Preston Cha' truncation; add a 3‑milestone timeline.
Acceptance_Criteria: No truncations; timeline present and readable.

Title: Where the money goes visual
Description: Simple graphic breakdown (fabric, poles, paint, logistics) with AA contrast and text alternatives.
Acceptance_Criteria: Graphic accessible with text alternatives; contrast AA.
Validation_Steps: Contrast check; SR text alt readout.

Title: Success screen upgrade
Description: Friendly confirmation with response-time SLA and share buttons.
Acceptance_Criteria: Success page/screen implemented.

Title: Events & funnels
Description: Instrument CTA clicks, donation starts/completions, gallery opens, scroll depth; dashboard.
Acceptance_Criteria: Dashboard shows Home→Donate completion funnel.

Title: Live progress & deadline
Description: Display total raised, goal, cutoff date; accessible progress bar.
Acceptance_Criteria: Daily updates; bar has text equivalents.

Title: Impact copy per tier
Description: Add plain-language impact lines for each donation tier.
Acceptance_Criteria: Each tier shows a specific impact statement.
Validation_Steps: Editorial review; optional A/B test plan.

Title: Trust elements near CTAs
Description: Add FSA/FAN affiliation, quotes near Donate; display fees model (Stripe vs GoFundMe).
Acceptance_Criteria: Trust cues visible within CTA viewport.

Title: 3‑step explainer & sponsor card
Description: Add 3‑step explainer and business sponsor card above fold (works on 390px wide).
Acceptance_Criteria: Explainer + sponsor card visible and scannable on mobile.
Validation_Steps: Mobile viewport checks; quick usability scan.

Title: Error handling & 404 UX
Description: Custom 404 with search/primary links; log 4xx/5xx.
Acceptance_Criteria: Friendly 404; server logging enabled.

Title: A/B tests scaffolding (optional)
Description: Set up lightweight framework for A/B tests (hero subheadline; trust-cue proximity).
Acceptance_Criteria: Ability to run 2 variants per test with metrics captured.
